com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto

Class TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base.IdentifiableDto
      • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base.NamedDto
        • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDto, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto
extends NamedDto
    A filter for referenced/referring issues
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto()
        Default constructor

      • TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto(java.lang.Integer fieldId,
                             java.lang.String fieldLabel)
        Create a new filter for all issues referenced via the specified fieldId or referring via reference fields with the specified label
        Parameters:
        fieldId - to filter issues referenced by a source via this field
        fieldLabel - to filter issues referring to a target via reference fields with the specified label

      • TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto(java.lang.Integer fieldId,
                             java.lang.String fieldLabel,
                             java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> typeIds,
                             java.lang.Integer flags,
                             java.lang.Integer filter)
        Create a new filter for issues referenced via the specified fieldId or referring via reference fields with the specified label
        Parameters:
        fieldId - to filter issues referenced by a source via this field
        fieldLabel - to filter issues referring to a target via reference fields with the specified label
        typeIds - is a Set of TrackerTypeDto ids of the referenced/referring issues to filter, or null (any type)
        flags - is the Id of the TrackerItemFlagsOption to use when searching for referenced/referring issues
        filter - is the time filter to use when searching for referenced/referring issues

      • TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto(java.lang.Object field,
                             java.lang.Object types,
                             java.lang.Object flags,
                             java.lang.Object filter)
        Create a new filter for issues referenced via the specified fieldId or referring via reference fields with the specified label
        Parameters:
        field - identifies the reference field
        types - of the referenced/referring issues to filter, or null (any type)
        flags - to use when searching for referenced/referring issues
        filter - to use when searching for referenced/referring issues

      • TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto(java.lang.String refType,
                             java.lang.Integer flags,
                             java.lang.Integer filter)
        Create a new filter for issues referenced via the specified fieldId or referring via reference fields with the specified label
        Parameters:
        refType - identifies the reference field and the issue type(s)
        flags - to use when searching for referenced/referring issues
        filter - to use when searching for referenced/referring issues

        Parameters:
        filter - to copy

        public TrackerItemReferenceFilterDto(java.lang.String encoded)
        Create a references filter from an encoded String
        Parameters:
        encoded - filter definition "field|typeId[:...]|flags|filter"
